prompt: An expansive, enchanting cosmic scene. The Lumina Nebula features wisps of colorful gas clouds in hues of blue, purple, and pink. Among the clouds, glimmering stars shine brightly, interspersed with smaller, whimsical celestial bodies. There's a sense of magic and wonder as particles of stardust float through the space. The edges of the nebula are dotted with smaller satellite galaxies, adding to the grandeur and depth of the scene. Overall, the image blends a sense of whimsy with the awe-inspiring expanse of the universe, rendered in dark, vibrant fantasy art style.
